title: Odisha gets 1st AI-generated news anchor 'Lisa'
selftext: An Odisha-based private news channel Odisha TV on Sunday launched an AI-generated news anchor named 'Lisa'. An artificial woman will present news both in Odia and English for OTV Network's television and digital platforms, a company release said.
comments:
This is Eliza Cassan, reporting “Live” (wink) from Picus. 


Iykyk
